11121.content:
Fox McCloud awoke in a cold, metal room with a single, dim lamp above the center of the room. There were no visible doors or windows, no escape. He remembered being ambushed as he returned from a pilots' convention on Corneria, but nothing after that. He looked down and found himself naked, no doubt to keep him from attempting an escape. He stood up and walked around the edge of the room, knocking on the metal walls and hoping to hear the hollow sound of a hidden door. 

As he neared the last corner of the room with no luck, he stepped on something fluffy in the dark. Whatever it was, it let out a sharp yelp and jerked away. He couldn't see what it was, so he jumped back into the light. From the shadows, he heard a familiar voice call out his name: "Fox?"

The nude form of Wolf O'Donnell stepped forward into the light. His cybernetic eyepatch had been replaced by an old-style cloth patch. He held his head and came closer. 

"Where are we? What's going on?" he asked. 

"I don't know, but I think we might be prisoners," the vulpine replied. "I've been checking the walls and floor, but there doesn't seem to be any way in or out of here. The only chance would be an air duct in the ceiling, but I can't see anything and it's too high up."

"Maybe you could get on my shoulders and reach it," Wolf suggested. 

Fox agreed it was worth a try and climbed up on the lupine's shoulders. He sat with his legs around Wolf's neck and his junk rubbing against his rival. As awkward as it was, he knew they had to find a way out. 

After a thorough search of the ceiling, they were forced to admit that there was no way out. There was no access to the ductwork in the room, just small slits in the metal that allowed air circulation. They were trapped. 

"So now what?" Wolf asked as he let Fox down. 

But before Fox could answer, the sound of hissing gas filled the room. Down from the vents came a light blue mist that filled the room. The two instinctively tried to hold their breath, but eventually they had to breathe. 

Fox gulped down the gas-laiden air and prepared to die. But instead of a foul-smelling lethal gas, he found a pleasant fragrance that instantly made him erect. He found that Wolf was similarly affected and asked what he thought. 

"Pheremones," Wolf concluded, "and powerful ones at that. Whoever kidnapped us apparently wants us to get hot and horny. Obviously they didn't think we had strong wills."

Fox nodded in understanding, but in his mind he screamed with frustration. Ever since the Aparoid invasion, he had come to see Wolf in a different light, first as a competitive friend, then as an extremely attractive hunk. Fox had never let anyone know he was gay, he wasn't attracted to his fellow StarFox males and his "relationship" with Krystal was a good cover up. Until he had saved his life, Fox's hatred of Wolf had supressed his lust for such a sexy beast. But now that they were friends, it was extremely hard for him to cover his attraction to the lupine. Now he was trapped in a room naked with his fantasy man and being assailed by pheremones. How could he hide it?

Fox closed his eyes and tried to think of non-sexual things, but it was no use. He lay sideways, back to his crush, and focused on not jumping on Wolf and making love to him.

He didn't know how long he was there, but Fox was startled from his focus by the feeling of someone touching him. He sat up, turned around, and found himself face to face with Wolf. The lupine was on his hands and knees and had a desperate look in his eyes. 

"Fox, I'm sorry, I have to..."

Before Fox could react in any way, Wolf dove down on his fellow prisoner's crotch and began to lick his genitals. Fox moaned and caressed Wolf's headfur. This action made the lupine stop mid-lick and raise his head to look Fox in the eye. 

"You're not reacting like I thought you would," Wolf observed. "Onviously I wasn't the only one with a secret love."

"You wanted me, too?" Fox asked. 

Wolf nodded and the two stared long into each other's eyes. Finally, Wolf broke the trance by leaning in and planting his lips against Fox's. The two canines caressed their partner's bodies while their tongues intertwined. They moved to their knees and hugged each other, their throbbing members sliding against one another in a coating of precum. Fox took the lead, giving into his deepest fantasies. He took Wolf's head in one hand and pressed their lips even harder together. He fought for dominance with his tongue and succeeded. As he explored every crevice of Wolf's mouth, his other hand went down and took both of their members together. Sliding along the two shafts, Fox noticed that they were abouth the same size, though Wolf was slightly larger. 

For his part, Wolf was okay with Fox taking over. At first he was surprised, then he thought of taking control (his strength would have allowed him to be dominant); but he realized that he wanted Fox to lead, in truth he was afraid. 

He had loved that ginger-furred fox since he first saw him, though he had put it out of his mind to fulfill his mission. It was easy to ignore his attraction when Fox seemed to hate him, but now that they had put their animosities aside he found it difficult to resist. He had been afraid Fox would reject him; he was still afraid. What if this was only because of the pheremones? As long as Fox kept going, Wolf was reassured. So he let the smaller canine continue.

"Damn, Fox, that was the best I've ever felt."

"Do you want to keep going?" Wolf nodded eagerly. "Then why don't we try..."

11131.content:
Fox and Tricky were relaxing along the shores of Cape Claw, it was after Andross’ defeat and Fox had returned to hang out with Tricky for a short while before leaving. Both had a grown very close to each during their adventure together.

“Hey Fox, watch this!” the little triceratops yelled before jumping into the water, splashing the vulpine who had sat too close before he realised.

“Ah, thanks Tricky,” Fox said sarcastically. Standing up and shaking as much water as he could off.

“Sorry,” Tricky replied while snickering. The young prince climbed out of the water and walked up to Fox, dripping wet.

“No, Tricky, don’t you...” the dinosaur vigorously shook himself, sending more water across over Fox, “...dare.”

Tricky laughed out loud at the now soaking wet vulpine, who scowled at him in return. “Ha, ha, very funny Tricky.”

Fox couldn’t go back soaking wet, he needed to dry his clothes. It was a beautiful day; maybe he could leave his clothes somewhere and wait for them to dry. He started taking off his jacket and top, Tricky stopped laughing when he saw Fox remove his shirt.

“Err...F-Fox, what are you doing?” he asked, slightly nervous.

“Need to dry my clothes, going to let them dry,” he said as he threw his jacket and shirt over a branch. “That’s not a problem for you, is it?” Fox asked nervously.

“No, no, no problem,” replied Tricky, but in reality it was a problem for him.

Over the course of their adventure together, Tricky had started having more and more intimate thoughts and feelings for Fox, to the point he knew he was crushing on the vulpine badly. Now his crush was stripping before him and he was struggling to maintain his cool.

He tried not to visibly squirm as Fox stripped out of his clothes, until the vulpine was only in a pair of white briefs. Tricky couldn’t resist staring at the almost naked vulpine before him, drinking in the site of Fox’s toned muscles. The young Prince could feel his cock growing with arousal.

“You ok Tricky?” Tricky almost jumped, he had been caught staring.

“Yeah, I’m ok” he replied, trying to hide his slowly growing erection.

Fox curiously watched the triceratops awkwardly turn around. He almost gasped when he caught a brief glimpse of Tricky’s semi-erect member dangling between his hind legs. Despite being semi erect, it was huge, mouth wateringly huge.

Fox quickly discarded that thought from his head, he shouldn’t be thinking of Tricky like that. But the vulpine felt his briefs tighten. The more he thought of Tricky, the harder he got. Fox adjusted his legs to hide his hard on, thankfully Tricky was facing the other way. Unfortunately for Fox, he could once again see Tricky’s cock, this time almost at full mast. A sudden fresh wet sensation snapped his mind back, he had been drooling! But try as he, might Fox couldn’t resist the sight of Tricky’s member.

A thought then came into his head, ‘Did I cause that?’ Fox blushed at the thought but he hoped it was true. He had to find out, he just had too.

“T-Tricky, I need to ask you something?” he nervously asked.

“Y-Yes,” the prince turned to face him almost timidly, “what is it?”

Fox’s face went a shade of red, “I couldn’t help but notice your...pride...”

Tricky flushed red with embarrassment, and tried desperately to hide his cock. “I’m sorry Fox! I didn’t mean for it! I just...”

“Tricky!” The dinosaur stopped. “Just tell me, and please be honest, is that...because of me?”

It was hard to tell who was more embarrassed, there was an uneasy silence between the two, before Fox spoke. “I’m sorry, Tricky! I shouldn’t have asked...”

“Yes!”

Fox looked at Tricky. “Yes, it’s because of you.” The young dinosaur had his eyes shut as he confessed. “I’ve had a crush on you during our adventure. And when you took off your clothes, I just couldn’t keep it together. I’m sorry Fox.”

Tricky remained still as Fox processed the information. He looked at the young dinosaur prince and felt his own arousal strain in his briefs. Without a word, Fox kneeled in front of Tricky until their faces were inches apart. Before he could back out, Fox leaned forward and placed a kiss on Tricky’s lips. Tricky’s eyes shot open, but quickly closed as he kissed back. After what felt like a lifetime, the pair parted and smile at each other.

“Thank you, Fox,” said Tricky.

“You’re welcome, guess I was almost attracted to you too.” The pair chuckled as they kissed again. This time it gradually proceeded to a full blown make out session. When they parted, Fox found himself lying on his back, with Tricky on top with his massive hard on sandwiched between them.

Fox gave Tricky a sultry look. “Let’s make the most of our time.”

Tricky grinned at Fox, “You mean...?”

“Yes,” Fox replied, “But I’m a bit overdressed.”

Tricky let Fox stand up watched with great joy as Fox pulled his briefs off, setting his erect member free from its restraints.
